# text_overflow_policy enumeration

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/ui/text_overflow_policy>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T07:09:17.721148

---

Text overflow policy values:
Clip: Overflowing text will be clipped.
Ellipsis: Overflowing text will be replaced with an ellipsis.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /UnrealEngine.com/Temporary/UI }` |

The `text_overflow_policy` enumeration includes the following enumerators:

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |

| `Ellipsis` |  |
